name: ShorthandCodeSystem
title: Shorthand Code System
description: Code system containing local codes defined in FHIR Shorthand.

concept.definition: The instance represents an example, not a real-life resource, and will be presented as such in an IG.
The instance is not instantiated as an independent resource, but appears as part of another instance (for example, in a composition or bundle).
The instance is a conformance item, specifically, instances of a resource such as a search parameter, operation definition, or questionnaire. These items will presented on their own IG page.
